summary: The document is a confidential SECRET message dated May 7, 1960, from Havana to the Director, discussing a report on planned sabotage activities by the Juventud Accion Cubana Anticomunista (JACA) between April 30 and May 3, 1960. It references a source with contacts in JACA (F) and includes comments on the report's classification and restricted distribution.
key_findings: The document pertains to a report on planned sabotage activities by Cuban youth groups.
It highlights the involvement of the Juventud Accion Cubana Anticomunista in these activities.
The message is classified as SECRET and emphasizes restricted reproduction and distribution.
It references a specific report (Havana 41k) and includes a note on the source's credibility.
